description:
TECHinPORTO was born in 2017 from Jumia's will to share and promote Porto's state of the art Information Technologies. By teaming up with great technology partners, we expect to bring the best from the tech community to our blooming city, learn together and deliver a kickass experience.
Jumia, as the biggest online services ecosystem in Africa, chose Porto to establish its tech center of excellence. For six years we achieved a lot in the African continent and in the Porto tech scene. 
With social responsibility in mind, all ticket’s proceeds will go to G.A.S.Porto and Crescer Ser.
Join us in this awesome journey and contribute to make TECHinPORTO great!
name: TECHinPORTO 2018
